message_1: What is the balanced chemical equation for the combustion of methane gas (CH4) with oxygen (O2) to produce carbon dioxide (CO2) and water (H2O)?
message_2:
The balanced chemical equation for the combustion of methane gas (CH4) with oxygen (O2) to produce carbon dioxide (CO2) and water (H2O) is:

CH4 + 2O2 â†’ CO2 + 2H2O
